hide_on_mobile.label: Hide Mini Cart on Mobile Devices
hide_on_mobile.comment: Mini cart in header can be hidden on mobile devices.

mini_menu_on_laptop.label: Enable Minimized Menu on Laptop Screen
mini_menu_on_laptop.comment: Enable Minimized Menu in left navigation bar on Laptop (screen height: less than 800px)

alternative_image.label: Alternative Image
alternative_image.comment: Show thumbnail image when hover in product image area.

layered_nav.label: Show Layered Navigation
layered_nav.comment: Show Layered Navigation Bar in the right sidebar.

hide_compare.label: Hide Compare Button
hide_compare.comment: Hide Compare button on the toolbar.

hover_button.label: Product Hover Links
hover_button.comment: Show "Add to cart", add to links when hover above the image.

custom_css.label: Load Custom CSS
custom_css.comment: Enable this option to load "custom.css" file is located in skin/frontend/default/trego/css directory.

import_blocks.label: Static Blocks
import_blocks.comment: Click this button to create all static blocks provided with trego theme.

overwrite_blocks.label: Overwrite Existing Blocks
overwrite_blocks.comment: If the identifiers of the static blocks are already exist, you can set to "Yes" then save the configuration, then click the "Import Static Blocks" button.

import_pages.label: CMS Pages
import_pages.comment: Click this button to create all CMS pages provided with trego theme.

overwrite_pages.label: Overwrite Existing Pages
overwrite_pages.comment: If the identifiers of the cms pages are already exist, you can set to "Yes" then save the configuration, then click the "Import CMS Pages" button.
